1.question: Who was the Captain of the Enterprise NX-01?

2.question: What the max speed of the Enterprise NX-01?

4.question: What significant role did Captain Jonathan Archer's father play in history?
4.d: Lead developer of the warp five engine.

5.question: 'Star Trek: Enterprise' precedes 'Star Trek: The Original Series' in the timeline of the 'Star Trek' universe. Captain Kirk and his crew are first seen in the year 2265. What year does the Enterprise NX-01 with Captain Archer make its maiden voyage?

6.question: In the series pilot episode, 'Broken Bow', Enterprise is sent to return a Klingon warrior to his home world. What was that Klingon's name?

7.question: The droppings of Dr. Phlox's Altarian marsupial have what highly-prized property?
7.c: They give off vapors that make humans high

8.question: Although Jonathan was raised in San Francisco, where was he actually born?

9.question: Who is second in command aboard Enterprise?

10.question: What is Ensign Sato's first name.

11.question: In 'Broken Bow' Captain Archer gets shot in the leg. What seemingly inappropriately-named creature does Dr. Phlox use to help heal the wound?

12.question: What was the name of the officer who was selected ahead of Archer to pilot the NX-Alpha and by doing so, became the first person to travel at warp 2?

13.question: Surveying an uninhabited planet in the season two episode 'Minefield', the Enterprise got hit by a cloaked mine. Another attached itself to its hull. What race had put the mines around the planet?

14.question: In what year was Enterprise NX-01 launched?

15.question: In 'Fight or Flight', what reason does Dr. Phlox give as to why he's interested in helping to keep Ensign Hoshi Sato's pet alive?
15.a: He wants to cross-breed it with his Algean Rat
15.b: He wants to feed it to his bat
15.c: He wants to eat its eggs
15.d: It reminds him of a childhood pet

17.question: What is Chief Engineer Trip's full name

18.question: In the episode 'The Expanse' an alien device attacks Earth, cutting a trench into the Earth's surface between which two places?

19.question: What is the name of the Vulcan ambassador to Earth?

20.question: When the crew of the Enterprise encountered a black hole that affected everyone adversely, causing various obsessive behaviours, Dr. Phlox almost performed a major surgery on a patient suffering only from a headache. Who was the patient?

21.question: Most of you know Jonathan Archer brought his dog, an adorable beagle, with him on the Enterprise. This lucky dog was named Porthos and he had a favorite snack but unfortunately this snack sometimes gave him gastrointestinal problems which has been the reason for at least one trip to sickbay. What was Porthos' favorite snack?

22.question: The start of the third season of saw the introduction of non-Starfleet personnel from Military Assault Command Operations (MACOs). Which character was the MACO commander?

23.question: On Enterprise, who is the tactical officer?

24.question: T'Pol's great grandmother visited what town on Earth in the 1950's?

25.question: In 'Sleeping Dogs', T'Pol and Hoshi Sato enter the Klingon galley and find Gagh. What is Gagh?

26.question: In 'Chosen Realm', Captain Archer comes to the aid of a group of religious pilgrims. These people soon hijack the Enterprise to end a religious war. What was the name of the group of people?

27.question: In 'Chosen Realm', Captain Archer comes to the aid of a group of religious pilgrims. These people soon hijack the Enterprise to end a religious war. What was the name of the group of people?

28.question: In what month was the first Xindi attack on Earth?

29.question: Which species of Xindi was extinct in the show?

30.question: How many sentient beings make up the Xindi
30.d: All creatures on Xindi are sentient
